quote: Lebih baik kami mati terlupakan daripada selamanya dikenang orang karena menyerah
author: Homicide

quote: Tinju di angkasa, untuk mereka yang sagunya tergantikan sawit di papua
author: Morgue Vanguard

quote: In real open source, you have the right to control your own destiny.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: UNIX is basically a simple operating system, but you have to be a genius to understand the simplicity.
author: Dennis Ritchie

quote: Hip Hop was set out in the park, we used to do it out in the dark
author: MC Shan

quote: Yang terkuat di antara kamu adalah orang yang mengendalikan amarahnya.
author: Rasullulah SAW

quote: When we speak of free software, we are referring to freedom, not price.
author: Richard Stallman
